Megatron Revived:

"I cannot allow you to leave.  Leaving would hurt Malice, chances of 
defeating Unicron, and would worry your sister needlessly.  Think for 
the future Blacknightmare, pain and hurt is temporary.  You must move 
on, things cannot be changed.  Stay, you never know what you may find 
here."
